scripts.dev: node -e "console.log('Starting SeiMoney Bots Service on port 3003...'); require('http').createServer((req, res) => { res.writeHead(200, {'Content-Type': 'application/json'}); res.end(JSON.stringify({status: 'ok', message: 'SeiMoney Bots Service', bots: ['telegram', 'discord']})); }).listen(3003, () => console.log('Bots service listening on port 3003'));"
scripts.build: cd telegram && npm run build && cd ../discord && npm run build
scripts.install-deps: cd telegram && npm install && cd ../discord && npm install
